00147   void initQuickprop() 
00148   {
00149     deltaw.resize(w.nelem());
00150     dedwOld.resize(w.nelem());
00151     dedwOld = 0; deltaw = 0; 
00152   }

00155 //===========================================================================
00182   int quickprop(const Array<double> &in,
00183                 const Array<double> &out,
00184                 double              nu   = 1.5  ,   // learning rate
00185                 double              dMax = 1.75)     // upper limit of n
00186   {
00187     derror(in, out,false);
00188 
00189     for(unsigned  i = 0; i < w.nelem(); i++) {
00190       // avoid division by zero
00191       if(dedwOld(i) == dedw(i)) break;
00192       
00193       // quadratic part
00194       delta = dedw(i) / (dedwOld(i) - dedw(i)) * deltaw(i);;
00195       
00196       // add gradient term "unless the current slope is opposite in sign from
00197       // the previous slope"
00198       // initial step is steepest descent
00199       if(dedw(i) * dedwOld(i) >= 0) {
00200         delta -= nu * dedw(i);
00201       }
00202       
00203       // limit growth factor if slopes have the same sign
00204       if( (dedw(i) * dedwOld(i) > 0) &&
00205           (fabs(delta) > fabs(dMax * deltaw(i))) )
00206         delta = sgn(delta) * fabs(dMax * deltaw(i));
00207       
00208       deltaw(i) = delta;
00209       
00210       w(i) += deltaw(i);
00211     }
00212     
00213     dedwOld = dedw;
00214     return 0;
00215   }
00216 
00217 
00218 //===========================================================================
00244   int quickpropOrig(const Array<double> &in,
00245                     const Array<double> &out,
00246                     double              nu   = 1.5  ,   // learning rate
00247                     double              dMax = 1.75)    // upper limit of n
00248   {
00249     derror(in, out,false);
00250 
00251     double shrinkFactor = dMax / (1 + dMax);
00252 
00253     for(unsigned  i = 0; i < w.nelem(); i++) {
00254       // avoid division by zero
00255       if(dedwOld(i) == dedw(i)) break;
00256       
00257       delta = 0.;
00258       
00259       if(deltaw(i) < 0.) {
00260         if(dedw(i) > 0.) 
00261           // add negative gradient
00262           delta -= nu * dedw(i);
00263         if(dedw(i) > shrinkFactor * dedwOld(i))
00264           delta += dMax * deltaw(i);
00265         else
00266           // quadratic part
00267           delta += dedw(i) / (dedwOld(i) - dedw(i)) * deltaw(i);
00268       }
00269       else if(deltaw(i) > 0.) {
00270         if(dedw(i) < 0.) 
00271           // add negative gradient
00272           delta -= nu * dedw(i);
00273         if(dedw(i) < shrinkFactor * dedwOld(i))
00274           delta += dMax * deltaw(i);
00275         else
00276           // quadratic part
00277           delta += dedw(i) / (dedwOld(i) - dedw(i)) * deltaw(i);
00278       } else {
00279         delta -= nu * dedw(i);
00280       }
00281 
00282       deltaw(i) = delta;
00283       w(i) += deltaw(i);
00284     }
00285     
00286     dedwOld = dedw;
00287     return 0;
00288   }

00307   void clearMemory() { dedwOld = 0; deltaw = 0; };

00329   double    sgn(double x) 
00330   { 
00331     if (x > 0) return 1.; if (x < 0) return -1.; return 0.; 
00332   }
